title: Sound On: Schweiker, Garamendi on Infrastructure Plan
itunes:title: Sound On: Schweiker, Garamendi on Infrastructure Plan
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Former Pennsylvania Governor Mark Schweiker Rep. John Garamendi (D-CA) Bloomberg Politics contributor Jeanne Shaheen Zaino John Sitilides, Geopolitical strategist at Trilogy Advisors and diplomacy consultant to the State Dept Jodi Schneider, Bloomberg News Political Director

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
